diagnostic_functions.spatial_bias#

spatial_bias(data: Dataset, ref: Dataset, relative=False)[source]#

Calculate the spatial bias of the data compared to the reference.

Parameters:

  • data (DataTree) – The data to calculate the spatial bias of.

  • ref (xr.Dataset) – The reference data to compare the data to.

Returns:

The spatial bias of the data compared to the reference.

Return type:

Dataset
